author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DANIEL DRIFTING FOR NOW BUT EXPECTED TO START MOVING NORTHEASTWARD SOON...
summary:
...DANIEL DRIFTING FOR NOW BUT EXPECTED TO START MOVING NORTHEASTWARD SOON...
 As of 2:00 PM PDT Sat Aug 3
 the center of Daniel was located near 12.3, -130.4
 with movement N at 2 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Daniel (EP4/EP042024)
